subject: Off Topic - Need Java Testing professionals
msgSnippet: Ness Technologies is looking for Testing professionals who have the following exposure/skill set; Good understanding of J2EE technologies Used Junit/JUnit
messageBody:
Ness Technologies is looking for Testing professionals who have the
following exposure/skill set;

Good understanding of J2EE technologies
Used Junit/JUnit harness testing background
Extensive server side testing experience
Has done API testing
Exposure to Web Services testing (SOAP)
EAI integration testing
Has good Java programming background (preferably a java developer
turned Testing professional)
Test automation in these areas
5-8 years of experience

We are at present building a test lab to support a prestigeous
project. A core team being formed will have the opportunity to bring
the technology from US and implement it here.

For additional information or for sending in your resume, you can
contact;

Calvin Ebenezer
calvin@...

S Anand
Sr. Manager - Quality
Ness Technologies
Bangalore
